name: Crystalien: Mega Blastar
description:
How to Play

Collect the glowing crystals and place them in the portal while blasting away at alien bugs. But be careful! The more crystals you have the more aliens will come after you and when you place the crystals in the portal they will get angry.

Controls
  • W - Move forward
  • S - Move Backward
  • A & D - Rotate
  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • SPACE - Place Crystal in Portal
  • E - Drop Crystal
